articles.description: Adapted from the popular video game series, the whole thing plays like ersatz Indiana Jones
articles.content: Like text thats been translated into another language and then re-translated back by someone else, Uncharted bears a clunky resemblance to any number of classic action-adventure movies. Technically, … [+4516 chars]

articles.title: Alia Bhatt on criticism over Gangubai Kathiawadi, trolls, gender divide & if she's doing Baiju Bawra - Bollywood Bubble
articles.description: Alia Bhatt is truly a trailblazer from this generation of actors. While the Gangubai Kathiawadi teaser did raise everyone's interests and also sparked a deba...
